paragraph: Now, in the city, Lena, a internal-affairs detective, must prove a fatal shooting was a cover-up before a deadline. When a police syndicate wiping digital evidence forces Lena to commit, there is no turning back. After a brutal setback, Lena realizes the old belief was false and must now change tactics in line with the moral premise. Pressure escalates until only one final path remains, leaving no choice but to drive toward the endgame. In a final confrontation, Lena faces the opposition and wins, achieving the goal.
moral_premise: People succeed when they act with courage, and they fail when they protect themselves at the cost of justice.

When a police syndicate wiping digital evidence forces Lena to commit, there is no turning back.
After a brutal setback, Lena realizes the old belief was false and must now change tactics in line with the moral premise.
Pressure escalates until only one final path remains, leaving no choice but to drive toward the endgame.
In a final confrontation, Lena faces the opposition and wins, achieving the goal.
